columns attribute.description: columns attribute for lists and exercisegroup.  e.g. cols="3"

width attribute.description: width attribute for images and side-by-sides

widths attribute.description: widths attribute for side-by-sides, e.g. widths="20% 80%"

margins.description: margins attribute for side-by-sides, e.g. margins="5% 10%"

valign.description: vertical align attribute for side-by-side and tabulars.

workspace.description: workspace, for exercise in worksheet (specify percentage of page to be left blank).

text (for xref).description: text attribute, to specify style of cross-reference text.

xinclude namespace.description: xinclud namespace: add to top division of xinclud-ed file.
